GetCount.name: GetCount
GetCount.description: Returns a value that represents a number of objects in the collection.

GetParent.name: GetParent
GetParent.description: Returns the parent object of the specified characters.

Insert.name: Insert
Insert.description: Inserts a string replacing the specified characters.

SetCaption.name: SetCaption
SetCaption.description: Sets a string value that represents the text of the specified range of characters.

params.name: Caption
params.description: A string value that represents the text of the specified range of characters.

GetCaption.name: GetCaption
GetCaption.description: Returns a string value that represents the text of the specified range of characters.

SetText.name: SetText
SetText.description: Sets the text for the specified characters.

GetText.name: GetText
GetText.description: Returns the text of the specified range of characters.

GetFont.name: GetFont
GetFont.description: Returns the ApiFont object that represents the font of the specified characters.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing characters in an object that contains text.
	 * @constructor
	 * @property {number} Count - The number of characters in the collection.
	 * @property {ApiRange} Parent - The parent object of the specified characters.
	 * @property {string} Caption - The text of the specified range of characters.
	 * @property {string} Text - The string value representing the text of the specified range of characters.
	 * @property {ApiFont} Font - The font of the specified characters.
	 */
description: Class representing characters in an object that contains text.

properties.name: Count
properties.description: The number of characters in the collection.

properties.name: Parent
properties.description: The parent object of the specified characters.

properties.name: Caption
properties.description: The text of the specified range of characters.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: The string value representing the text of the specified range of characters.
